languages.text: "Есть на мне и более мрачный долг. Простор полон творений богопротивных еретиков, несущих печать скверны. Они опасны для душ и коварны, но мне ведомо, как поступать с такими вещами. Если в руки твои попадут вещи опасные, полные скверны — отправь их мне, и награда за бдительность будет еще щедрее. Церкви святого Друза есть чем поделиться с Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: "Есть на мне и более мрачный долг. Простор полон творений богопротивных еретиков, несущих печать скверны. Они опасны для душ и коварны, но мне ведомо, как поступать с такими вещами. Если в странствиях ты столкнешься со святынями, несущими печать Его силы, пожертвуй их нашему реликварию, и я награжу тебя. Если же в руки твои попадет вещь опасная, полная скверны — принеси ее мне, и награда за бдительность будет еще щедрее".

languages.text: "I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon dangerous, corrupted objects — bring them to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous. The Drusian mission has much to share with the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Есть на мне и более мрачный долг. Простор полон творений богопротивных еретиков, несущих печать скверны. Они опасны для душ и коварны, но мне ведомо, как поступать с такими вещами. Если в руки твои попадут вещи опасные, полные скверны — отправь их мне, и награда за бдительность будет еще щедрее. Церкви святого Друза есть чем поделиться с Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: "I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious items are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you in your travels come upon relics bearing signs of His might, you can donate them to our reliquary, and I will reward you. And should a dangerous, corrupted object find its way into your hands — bring it to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous."

"I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious items are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you in your travels come upon relics bearing signs of His might, you can donate them to our reliquary, and I will reward you. And should a dangerous, corrupted object find its way into your hands — bring it to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous."

"I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. And should a dangerous, corrupted object find its way into your hands — bring it to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous."

"I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon relics bearing signs of His might, you can donate them to our reliquary, and I will reward you. And should a dangerous, corrupted object find its way into your hands — bring it to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous."

"I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon dangerous, corrupted objects — bring them to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous. The Drusian mission has much to share with the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “我还肩负着另一项更加阴暗的职责。科罗努斯扩区充满了邪恶的异端分子的不洁造物，这些邪恶的东西会为灵魂带来危险，但我知道该如何处理它们。如果你在旅行中遇到了危险的、遭到腐化的物品，请把它们带给我，我会为你的警觉提供更加丰厚的回报。德鲁苏斯教派的布道所，在许多方面都可以与行商浪人合作。”
languages.original_text: "I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon dangerous, corrupted objects — bring them to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous. The Drusian mission has much to share with the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “我还肩负着另一项更加阴暗的职责。科罗努斯扩区充满了邪恶的异端分子的不洁造物，这些邪恶的东西会为灵魂带来危险，但我知道该如何处理它们。如果你在旅行中遇到了危险的、遭到腐化的物品，请把它们带给我，我会为你的警觉提供更加丰厚的回报。德鲁苏斯教派的布道所，在许多方面都可以与行商浪人合作。”

languages.text: «Es mi deber cumplir una tarea más oscura: la Extensión está repleta de las creaciones mancilladas de los herejes; son un peligro para el alma, pero yo sé cómo lidiar con ellas. Si durante su viaje se encuentra con objetos corruptos y peligrosos, tráigamelos y recibirá una recompensa por su vigilancia. La misión drusiana tiene mucho que compartir con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon dangerous, corrupted objects — bring them to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous. The Drusian mission has much to share with the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Es mi deber cumplir una tarea más oscura: la Extensión está repleta de las creaciones mancilladas de los herejes; son un peligro para el alma, pero yo sé cómo lidiar con ellas. Si durante su viaje se encuentra con objetos corruptos y peligrosos, tráigamelos y recibirá una recompensa por su vigilancia. La misión drusiana tiene mucho que compartir con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「もうひとつ、暗い義務を背負っています。エクスパンスは不浄の異端者たちの穢れた創造物で満ちています。これらの狡猾な物品は魂にとって危険ですが、私はそれらをどう扱うべきか承知しています。旅先で危険な、穢れた物品に出くわしたら、私のところに持ってきていただきたいのです。もちろん、相応の報酬はお渡しします。ドルシアン聖務団は自由開拓者と利害が一致している部分が多いのです」
languages.original_text: "I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon dangerous, corrupted objects — bring them to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous. The Drusian mission has much to share with the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「もうひとつ、暗い義務を背負っています。エクスパンスは不浄の異端者たちの穢れた創造物で満ちています。これらの狡猾な物品は魂にとって危険ですが、私はそれらをどう扱うべきか承知しています。旅先で危険な、穢れた物品に出くわしたら、私のところに持ってきていただきたいのです。もちろん、相応の報酬はお渡しします。ドルシアン聖務団は自由開拓者と利害が一致している部分が多いのです」

languages.text: "Ich habe noch eine weitere, dunklere Pflicht. Die Ausdehnung ist angefüllt mit den befleckten Schöpfungen unheiliger Ketzer. Diese bösartigen Objekte sind eine Gefahr für die Seele, doch ich weiß, wie damit umzugehen ist. Solltet Ihr bei Euren Reisen auf gefährliche, korrumpierte Objekte treffen – dann bringt sie zu mir, und die Belohnung für Eure Wachsamkeit wird überaus großzügig ausfallen. Die Drusianer-Mission hat viel, was sie mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} teilen kann."
languages.original_text: "I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon dangerous, corrupted objects — bring them to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous. The Drusian mission has much to share with the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe noch eine weitere, dunklere Pflicht. Die Ausdehnung ist angefüllt mit den befleckten Schöpfungen unheiliger Ketzer. Diese bösartigen Objekte sind eine Gefahr für die Seele, doch ich weiß, wie damit umzugehen ist. Solltet Ihr bei Euren Reisen auf gefährliche, korrumpierte Objekte treffen – dann bringt sie zu mir, und die Belohnung für Eure Wachsamkeit wird überaus großzügig ausfallen. Die Drusianer-Mission hat viel, was sie mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} teilen kann."

languages.text: « J'ai aussi une autre charge, plus sombre. On croise dans les Étendues de Koronus les multiples créations corrompues d'hérétiques impies. Ces objets perfides sont un danger pour l'âme, mais je sais quoi en faire. Si jamais au cours de vos voyages, vous veniez à trouver certaines de ces reliques corrompues... Rapportez-les-moi, et je saurai vous récompenser généreusement pour votre vigilance. La mission drusienne a beaucoup à partager avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon dangerous, corrupted objects — bring them to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous. The Drusian mission has much to share with the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai aussi une autre charge, plus sombre. On croise dans les Étendues de Koronus les multiples créations corrompues d'hérétiques impies. Ces objets perfides sont un danger pour l'âme, mais je sais quoi en faire. Si jamais au cours de vos voyages, vous veniez à trouver certaines de ces reliques corrompues... Rapportez-les-moi, et je saurai vous récompenser généreusement pour votre vigilance. La mission drusienne a beaucoup à partager avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Başka, daha karanlık bir vazifem daha mevcut. Enginlik, uğursuz kâfirlerin iğrenç icatlarıyla dolu. Bu sinsi nesneler, ruhlar için tehlike teşkil eder. Bense onlarla ne yapmam gerektiğini bilirim. Yolculukların sırasında bu tip tehlikeli, yozlaşmış nesnelere denk gelirsen onları bana getir. Çabalarını cömertçe ödüllendireceğimden şüphen olmasın. Drusus misyonunun elinde Hür Tacir ile paylaşabileceği çok şey var."
languages.original_text: "I bear another, darker duty. The Expanse is filled with the tainted creations of unholy heretics. These insidious objects are a danger to the soul, but I know what to do with them. Should you on your travels come upon dangerous, corrupted objects — bring them to me, and the reward for your vigilance will be even more generous. The Drusian mission has much to share with the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Başka, daha karanlık bir vazifem daha vardır. Enginlik, yolunu kaybetmiş kâfirlerin kirli yaratımlarıyla doludur. Bu sinsi nesneler ruhlar için tehlike teşkil eder ancak ben onlarla ne yapmam gerektiğini bilirim. Yolculukların sırasında bu tip tehlikeli, yozlaşmış nesnelere denk gelirsen onları bana getir, çabalarını cömertçe ödüllendireceğimden hiç şüphen olmasın. Drusus misyonunun Hür Tacir ile paylaşabileceği birçok şey vardır."
